      • add

        public boolean add(Exercise exercise)
        Add or update a exercise as a serial file
        参数:
        exercise - exercise object
        返回:
        True if success and false if fail

      • getById

        public Exercise getById(java.lang.String id)
        Get a exercise object by its id
        覆盖:
        getById 在类中 DataRepository
        参数:
        id - The exercise's id
        返回:
        The exercise object if success and null if fail
